Rui Xu is a second-year PhD student in operations management with a strong passion for data science and intelligent decision-making in business and healthcare. He has authored several papers in SCI/SSCI-indexed journals on these topics. Additionally, he serves as a reviewer for the International Journal of Health Policy and Management (SCI & SSCI Q1).
